long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are a thousand reasons to boycott Amazon : catastrophic climate impact, lack of worker rights, tax evasion, impact on small and local businesses, and many more. 

This extension erases Amazon from the web, no more links to it are visible, and if you try to go to the website... you will be redirected to a website explaining why you should boycott !
